The sketch contains three loops—two circles and a four-arc shape. Now, scale the sketch by a factor of 0.75. Transform Sketch - Scaling: Use a factor of 0.75. Extrusion - Extrude depth towards the normal: 0.0337 - Extrude depth opposite the normal: 0.0 - Sketch scale: 0.75 After extruding, you will have the final CAD part for the metal rod. Description - Shape: A simple, curved metal rod with two holes at each end. - Length: 0.75 - Width: 0.75 - Height: 0.0337</description>
